name: podman

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
An optionally rootless and daemonless container engine: alias
docker=podman

dependencies.name: go
dependencies.description: The golang compiler and build environment

dependencies.name: go-md2man
dependencies.description: go-md2man converts markdown into roff (man pages)

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: cni-plugins
dependencies.description: Standard networking plugins for container networking

dependencies.name: runc
dependencies.description:
CLI tool for spawning containers on Linux according to the OCI
specification

dependencies.name: slirp4netns
dependencies.description: User-mode networking for unprivileged network namespaces

dependencies.name: gpgme
dependencies.description:
GPGME is the standard library to access GnuPG functions from programming
languages.

dependencies.name: libassuan
dependencies.description: Libassuan is a small library implementing the so-called Assuan protocol.

dependencies.name: libgpg-error
dependencies.description: Common error values for all GnuPG components.

dependent_to.name: singularity-hpc
dependent_to.description:
Local filesystem registry for containers (intended for HPC) using Lmod
or Environment Modules. Works for users and admins.
